1: Article  with [h2] & [h3] - The article will be approximately 2500 words long
2: Article with 5 - 6 [h2] & [h3] - The article will be approximately 1800 - 2500 words long
3: Article with 7- 8 [h2] & [h3] - The article will be approximately 1500 - 2000 words long
4: Article with 9 - 10 [h2] & [h3] - The article will be approximately 1800 - 2500 words long
